name: Webedia
overview:
The reference site on the news of the stars to brands positioning

With 80 news per day Purepeople.com is the most comprehensive website on the French news stars.

Disney Co is bound by a strict editorial policy regarding the respect for private life and the image of stars.

The information provided by Purepeople.com intersects three worlds:

 The Entertainment: with lots of information on the Cinema, the news of shootings, the cult TV series, the highlights of PAF, music news, coverage of major concerts. In short, the news of the stars where they exercise their talents.
 Glamour: with significant resources deployed to cover major events (Cannes, galas, large-type &#8220;Oscar&#8221; and &#8220;Caesar&#8221; parties, premieres and movie theater &#8230;). The news of the &#8220;beautiful people&#8221; in representation.
 The &#8220;slices of life&#8221; pink book, weddings, celebrity looks &#8230; The part of their private sphere that wish Stars show their public &#8230;

audience

Disney Co is a leading site on the target women, youth, CSP +.

Purepeople.com: A powerful support for all brands and advertisers who seek to communicate with a target of CSP + young women by partnering with quality content using the prescription strength of stars. the Editors
